task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 294°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will start by looking up to find the roof.
I have seen the top of the building, now I need to look down to see the base to get a complete view for my height estimation.
I have now viewed the building from top to bottom; it appears to be about 8 stories high, and assuming a standard height of 3 meters per story, I estimate the total height to be 24 meters.
